Donations for Labour leadership campaign from: Mahaboob Basha, Trosol (translation business), David Flatt, Barry Lynch, Selena Booth, Barry Evans, Ian Morgan, Susan Griffiths, James Hadley (ceased), Kate Little, Matthew Gearing, Clive Jones, Liz Herbert McAvoy, Duraseal E W I Ltd (civil engineering company), Lancehawk (telecommunications company), Sanjiv Joshi, Robert Fellows, Dr Ahmed Salamat, use of office space from Low Cost Vans ltd - 18 December 2023 to 16 March 2024, Sabeel Shamsudeen, Sevenoaks Modular Ltd (timber frame manufacturers), Cashmere UK Ltd (Cwmni Eiddo ar Les).
Jointly owns a residential tenanted property in Swansea.
